item.title: Gabi add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "The Road goes ever on and on Down from the door where it began. Now far ahead the Road has gone, And I must follow, if I can, Pursuing it with eager feet, Until it joins some larger way Where many paths and errands meet. And whither then? I cannot say" -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Gabi add a quote by Flight of the Conchords
item.description: "I'm the Hiphopapotomus, my lyrics are bottomless! uhhh...." -- Flight of the Conchords

item.title: Gabi add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description:
"All that is gold does not glitter, Not all those who wander are lost; The old that is strong does not wither, Deep roots are not reached by the frost.
From the ashes a fire shall be woken, A light from the shadows shall spring; Renewed shall be blade that was broken, The crownless again shall be king." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Gabi add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I wish it need not have happened in my time," said Frodo. "So do I," said Gandalf, "and so do all who live to see such times. But that is not for them to decide. All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given us." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Gabi add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "No Victory Without Suffering" -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Gabi add a quote by J.R.R. Tolkien
item.description: "I will not say, do not weep, for not all tears are an evil." -- J.R.R. Tolkien

item.title: Gabi add a quote by Meg Cabot
item.description: "Someone Hot is sometimes can't be the person they appear to be- except for their hotness... that cannot be denied. " -- Meg Cabot

item.title: Gabi add a quote by Meg Cabot
item.description: "Write the kind of story you would like to read. People will give you all sorts of advice about writing, but if you are not writing something you like, no one else will like it either." -- Meg Cabot

item.title: Gabi add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Oh well... I'd just been thinking, if you had died, you'd have been welcome to share my toilet." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Gabi add a quote by J.K. Rowling
Gabi add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Gabi add a quote by Stephen Colbert
item.description: "Baby carrots are making me gay." -- Stephen Colbert

item.title: Gabi add a quote by natalie babbit?
item.description:
"I visited a certain king who had a certain fool the king was gray with wisdom got from forty years of school
the fool was pink with nonsense and could barely write his name but he new a lot of little songs and sang them just the same
the fool was gay; the king was not now tell me if you can which was perhaps the greater fool and which the wiser man?" -- natalie babbit?

item.title: Gabi add a quote by Flight of the Conchords
item.description: "The humans are dead (I'm glad they are dead) The humans are dead (I noticed, they're dead) We used poisonous gases (With traces of lead) And we poisoned their asses (Actually, their lungs) Binary solo! 0000001, 00000011 000000111, 00001111!" -- Flight of the Conchords

item.title: Gabi add a quote by Flight of the Conchords
item.description:
"JEMAINE Lisa?
BRET Yes, she's in Delta Force. She's been deployed to Fallujah.
JEMAINE But she works in the croissant shop.
BRET Yeah, she's got two jobs. She's a pastry chef and a sniper." -- Flight of the Conchords

item.title: Gabi add a quote by Graham Chapman
item.description: "I don't want to talk to you no more, you empty headed animal food trough wiper. I fart in your general direction. Your mother was a hamster and your father smelt of elderberries." -- Graham Chapman

item.title: Gabi add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gabi add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gabi add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You have brains in your head. You have feet in your shoes. You can steer yourself any direction you choose. You're on your own. And you know what you know. And YOU are the one who'll decide where to go..." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Gabi add a quote by David Bowie
item.description: "Some make you sing and some make you scream. One makes you wish that you'd never been seen. But there's a shop on the corner that's selling papier mache, making bullet-proof faces, Charlie Manson, Cassius Clay. If you want it, boys, get it here, thing." -- David Bowie

item.title: Gabi add a quote by David Bowie
item.description: "... And these children that you spit on as they try to change their worlds are immune to your consultations. They're quite aware of what they're going through..." -- David Bowie

item.title: Gabi add a quote by Terry Pratchett
item.description: "I thought unicorns were more . . . Fluffy." -- Terry Pratchett

item.title: Gabi add a quote by Peter S. Beagle
item.description: "The magician stood erect, menacing the attackers with demons, metamorphoses, paralyzing ailments, and secret judo holds. Molly picked up a rock." -- Peter S. Beagle

item.title: Gabi add a quote by George W. Bush
item.description: "One of the great things about books is sometimes there are some fantastic pictures." -- George W. Bush

item.title: Gabi add a quote by George W. Bush
item.description: "I reads every chance I can gets." -- George W. Bush

item.title: Gabi add a quote by George W. Bush
item.description: "I am a war president." -- George W. Bush

item.title: Gabi add a quote by George W. Bush
item.description: "There's an old saying in Tennessee — I know it's in Texas, probably in Tennessee — that says, fool me once, shame on — shame on you. Fool me — you can't get fooled again." -- George W. Bush

item.title: Gabi add a quote by George W. Bush
item.description: "The important question is, How many hands have I shaked? " -- George W. Bush

item.title: Gabi add a quote by George W. Bush
item.description: "I just want you to know that, when we talk about war, we're really talking about peace." -- George W. Bush

item.title: Gabi add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde
